com.avaya.jtapi.tsapi

Interface LucentChargeAdviceEvent


  • public interface LucentChargeAdviceEvent
    The LucentChargeAdviceEvent reports network charges for observed calls on Lucent DEFINITY G3V5 switches. The event will not be reported until it is first enabled via the LucentV5Provider.setAdviceOfCharge() method.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      LucentCall getCall()
      The call for which this Charge Advice event is being reported
      LucentAddress getCalledAddress()
      The external address which was dialed
      int getCharge()
      The number of units charged
      short getChargeError()
      Charge-related error.
      short getChargeType()
      The type of charge being reported
      LucentAddress getChargingAddress()
      The address being charged for this call
      TsapiTrunk getTrunk()
      The trunk reporting the charge
